trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: An inherited class or event handler can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind> event to perform complex data binding.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用繼承的類別或事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind>事件來執行複雜資料繫結。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs> object, initializing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A> properties with the values of the `listItem` and `dataItem` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs>物件，初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A>屬性的值`listItem`和`dataItem`參數，分別。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified data object of the list item that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的資料物件的繫結的清單項目。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only on a request where the list item is data-bound; on subsequent postbacks, it is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是只能在要求上使用的清單項目所在的資料繫結。在後續回傳時，它會一律<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The specified data object of the list item that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料繫結清單項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ListItem that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得產生事件的清單項目。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The ListItem that generated the event.
